workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: The workgroup_id with permission to build the vrf, the user must be a member of this workgroup.
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

vrf_id.name: vrf_id
vrf_id.description: the ID of the VRF to remove from the network
vrf_id.validation_error_text: Parameter vrf_id only accepts integer numbers.

name: remove
description: removes a vrf that is on the network
